verses.verse: The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> again to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying<s%> to them,

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>'These<s%> are the <S%H9130>creatures<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you may <S%H398>eat<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H929>animals<s%> that are on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H3605>'Whatever<s%> <S%H6536>divides<s%> a <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> thus <S%H8156>making<s%> <S%H8156>split<s%> <S%H6541>hoofs,<s%> [and] <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> among the <S%H929>animals,<s%> that you may <S%H398>eat.<s%>

<S%H389>'Nevertheless,<s%> you are not to <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H2088>these,<s%> among those which <S%H5927>chew<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> or among those which <S%H6536>divide<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof:<s%> the <S%H1581>camel,<s%> for though it <S%H5927>chews<s%> <S%H1625>cud,<s%> it does not <S%H6536>divide<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> it is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.
'Likewise, the <S%H9627>rock<s%> <S%H9627>badger,<s%> for though it <S%H5927>chews<s%> <S%H1625>cud,<s%> it does not <S%H6536>divide<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> it is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you;
the <S%H768>rabbit<s%> also, for though it <S%H5927>chews<s%> <S%H1625>cud,<s%> it does not <S%H6536>divide<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> it is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you;

and the <S%H2386>pig,<s%> for though it <S%H6536>divides<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> thus <S%H8156>making<s%> a <S%H8156>split<s%> <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> it does not <S%H1641>chew<s%> <S%H1625>cud,<s%> it is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.
'You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> their <S%H5038>carcasses;<s%> they are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.

<S%H2088>'These<s%> you may <S%H398>eat,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> is in the <S%H4325>water:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that have <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales,<s%> those in the <S%H4325>water,<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas<s%> or in the <S%H5158>rivers,<s%> you may <S%H398>eat.<s%>

'But <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> is in the <S%H3220>seas<s%> and in the <S%H5158>rivers,<s%> that do not <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8318>teeming<s%> <S%H8318>life<s%> of the <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creatures<s%> that are in the <S%H4325>water,<s%> they are <S%H8263>detestable<s%> <S%H8263>things<s%> to you,
and they shall be <S%H8263>abhorrent<s%> to you; you may not <S%H398>eat<s%> of their <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and their <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> you shall <S%H8262>detest.<s%>
<S%H3605>'Whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> in the <S%H4325>water<s%> does not <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> is <S%H8263>abhorrent<s%> to you.

<S%H428>'These,<s%> moreover, you shall <S%H8262>detest<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H5775>birds;<s%> they are <S%H8263>abhorrent,<s%> not to be <S%H398>eaten:<s%> the <S%H5404>eagle<s%> and the <S%H6538>vulture<s%> and the <S%H5822>buzzard,<s%>
and the <S%H1676>kite<s%> and the <S%H344>falcon<s%> in its <S%H4327>kind,<s%>
<S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6158>raven<s%> in its <S%H4327>kind,<s%>
and the <S%H3284>ostrich<s%> and the <S%H8464>owl<s%> and the <S%H7828>sea<s%> <S%H7828>gull<s%> and the <S%H5322>hawk<s%> in its <S%H4327>kind,<s%>
and the <S%H9205>little<s%> <S%H9205>owl<s%> and the <S%H7994>cormorant<s%> and the <S%H3244>great<s%> <S%H3244>owl,<s%>
and the <S%H8580>white<s%> <S%H8580>owl<s%> and the <S%H6893>pelican<s%> and the <S%H7360>carrion<s%> <S%H7360>vulture,<s%>
and the <S%H2624>stork,<s%> the <S%H601>heron<s%> in its <S%H4327>kinds,<s%> and the <S%H1744>hoopoe,<s%> and the <S%H5847>bat.<s%>
<S%H3605>'All<s%> the <S%H5775>winged<s%> <S%H8318>insects<s%> that <S%H1980>walk<s%> on [all] <S%H702>fours<s%> are <S%H8263>detestable<s%> to you.

<S%H389>'Yet<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> you may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5775>winged<s%> <S%H8318>insects<s%> which <S%H1980>walk<s%> on [all] <S%H702>fours:<s%> those <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> their <S%H7272>feet<s%> jointed <S%H3767>legs<s%> with <S%H1992>which<s%> to <S%H9351>jump<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H428>'These<s%> of them you may <S%H398>eat:<s%> the <S%H697>locust<s%> in its <S%H4327>kinds,<s%> and the <S%H5556>devastating<s%> <S%H5556>locust<s%> in its <S%H4327>kinds,<s%> and the <S%H2728>cricket<s%> in its <S%H4327>kinds,<s%> and the <S%H2284>grasshopper<s%> in its <S%H4327>kinds.<s%>
'But <S%H3605>all<s%> other <S%H5775>winged<s%> <S%H8318>insects<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are four-footed are <S%H8263>detestable<s%> to you.

'By <S%H428>these,<s%> moreover, you will be <S%H2930>made<s%> <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> their <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> <S%H2930>becomes<s%> <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening,<s%>

and <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H5375>picks<s%> up <S%H4480>any<s%> of their <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

'Concerning <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H929>animals<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6536>divide<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> but do not <S%H8156>make<s%> a <S%H8156>split<s%> [hoof], or which do not <S%H5927>chew<s%> <S%H1625>cud,<s%> they are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you: <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> them <S%H2930>becomes<s%> <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

'Also <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> on its <S%H3709>paws,<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9130>creatures<s%> that <S%H1980>walk<s%> on [all] <S%H702>fours,<s%> are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you; <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> their <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> <S%H2930>becomes<s%> <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening,<s%>

and the one who <S%H5375>picks<s%> up their <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening;<s%> they are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.

'Now <S%H2088>these<s%> are to you the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> among the <S%H8318>swarming<s%> <S%H8318>things<s%> which <S%H8317>swarm<s%> on the <S%H776>earth:<s%> the <S%H2467>mole,<s%> and the <S%H5909>mouse,<s%> and the <S%H9468>great<s%> <S%H9468>lizard<s%> in its <S%H4327>kinds,<s%>
and the <S%H604>gecko,<s%> and the <S%H9208>crocodile,<s%> and the <S%H3911>lizard,<s%> and the <S%H2546>sand<s%> <S%H2546>reptile,<s%> and the <S%H8580>chameleon.<s%>

<S%H428>'These<s%> are to you the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8318>swarming<s%> <S%H8318>things;<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> them when they are <S%H4194>dead<s%> <S%H2930>becomes<s%> <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

'Also <S%H3605>anything<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> one of them may <S%H5307>fall<s%> when they are <S%H4194>dead,<s%> <S%H2930>becomes<s%> <S%H2930>unclean,<s%> <S%H4480>including<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H6086>wooden<s%> <S%H3627>article,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H899>clothing,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H5785>skin,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H8242>sack<s%> – <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3627>article<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4399>use<s%> is <S%H6213>made<s%> – it shall be <S%H935>put<s%> in the <S%H4325>water<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening,<s%> then it <S%H2891>becomes<s%> <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

'As for <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2789>earthenware<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> into <S%H834>which<s%> one of them may <S%H5307>fall,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> is in it <S%H2930>becomes<s%> <S%H2930>unclean<s%> and you shall <S%H7665>break<s%> the vessel.

<S%H4480>'Any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of the <S%H400>food<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> may be <S%H398>eaten,<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> shall <S%H2930>become<s%> <S%H2930>unclean;<s%> and <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4945>liquid<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> may be <S%H8354>drunk<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> shall <S%H2930>become<s%> <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

<S%H3605>'Everything,<s%> moreover, on <S%H834>which<s%> part of their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> may <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H2930>becomes<s%> <S%H2930>unclean;<s%> an <S%H8574>oven<s%> or a <S%H3600>stove<s%> shall be <S%H5422>smashed;<s%> they are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and shall <S%H1961>continue<s%> as <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.

<S%H389>'Nevertheless<s%> a <S%H4599>spring<s%> or a <S%H953>cistern<s%> <S%H9288>collecting<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> shall be <S%H2889>clean,<s%> though the one who <S%H5060>touches<s%> their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

'And <S%H3588>if<s%> a part of their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> on <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> for <S%H2221>sowing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is to be <S%H2232>sown,<s%> it is <S%H2889>clean.<s%>
'Though <S%H3588>if<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> is <S%H5414>put<s%> on the <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and a part of their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> on it, it is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.

'Also <S%H3588>if<s%> one of the <S%H929>animals<s%> <S%H4191>dies<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have for <S%H402>food,<s%> the one who <S%H5060>touches<s%> its <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H2930>becomes<s%> <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

'He too, who <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of its <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening;<s%> and the one who <S%H5375>picks<s%> up its <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>
'Now <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8318>swarming<s%> <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H8317>swarms<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H8263>detestable,<s%> not to be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>

<S%H3605>'Whatever<s%> <S%H1980>crawls<s%> on its <S%H1512>belly,<s%> and <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> on [all] <S%H702>fours,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> has <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H7272>feet,<s%> in respect to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8318>swarming<s%> <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H8317>swarms<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> them, for they are <S%H8263>detestable.<s%>

'Do not <S%H8262>render<s%> <S%H5315>yourselves<s%> <S%H8262>detestable<s%> through <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H8318>swarming<s%> <S%H8318>things<s%> that <S%H8317>swarm;<s%> and you shall not <S%H2930>make<s%> yourselves <S%H2930>unclean<s%> with them so that you <S%H2930>become<s%> <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

'For I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H6942>Consecrate<s%> yourselves therefore, and be <S%H6918>holy;<s%> for I am <S%H6918>holy.<s%> And you shall not <S%H2930>make<s%> <S%H5315>yourselves<s%> <S%H2930>unclean<s%> with <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H8318>swarming<s%> <S%H8318>things<s%> that <S%H7430>swarm<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

'For I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> who <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to be your <S%H430>God;<s%> thus you shall be <S%H6918>holy<s%> for I am <S%H6918>holy.<s%>' "

<S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> regarding the <S%H929>animal,<s%> and the <S%H5775>bird,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>moves<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and <S%H3605>everything<s%> that <S%H8317>swarms<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%>

to <S%H914>make<s%> a <S%H914>distinction<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean,<s%> and <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H398>edible<s%> <S%H9130>creature<s%> and the <S%H9130>creature<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is not to be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>
